title: Thrown Rocks Are No Threat to These Drones That Have Mastered Dodgeball
description: The days of knocking an annoying drone out of the air with a precisely thrown rock might soon be over. Researchers at the University of Zurich have upgraded a drone with a special camera that can quickly spot approaching obstacles, allowing the craft to avoid…
